title: Digital Marketing Manager
job_overview:
Digital Marketing Manager - Commercial Real Estate (Remote)
About the Opportunity
We're seeking an experienced Digital Marketing Manager to lead an ambitious online marketing campaign for a premier office building in Cleveland, Ohio. Our goal is to become the #1 choice for startups, medical/mental health practices, laboratory spaces, and light manufacturing businesses seeking office space in Cleveland.
Position Overview
This is a remote position with significant growth potential. You'll be leading a comprehensive, AI-powered digital marketing strategy that includes website optimization, content marketing, paid advertising, and lead generation. You'll work with a distributed team of specialists and have access to cutting-edge AI tools to maximize efficiency and results.
Key Responsibilities
Strategy & Leadership

Develop and execute a comprehensive digital marketing strategy targeting 4 key niches
Oversee and coordinate remote teaUpgrade to see actual infombers (SEO specialists, content writers, PPC specialists, VAs)
Create detailed buyer personas for each target segment
Conduct competitive analysis and market research for Cleveland commercial real estate

Website & SEO Management

Optimize existing website for search engines and user experience
Oversee creation of niche-specific landing pages and content
Implement and manage 3D virtual tours and interactive floor plans
Monitor and improve website performance using analytics tools

Content Marketing

Develop content calendar and editorial strategy
Oversee AI-assisted content creation for blogs, whitepapers, and case studies
Create thought leadership content positioning our building as the market authority
Manage social media presence across LinkedIn, Facebook, and Instagram

Paid Advertising

Design and manage Google Ads campaigns for local commercial real estate keywords
Execute LinkedIn advertising campaigns targeting specific industries and job titles
Optimize ad spend and improve ROI through continuous testing and refinement
Implement retargeting campaigns across multiple platforms

Lead Generation & CRM

Set up and optimize CRM systems (HubSpot preferred)
Implement AI-powered chatbots for 24/7 lead qualification
Create automated email nurture sequences for different prospect types
Develop lead scoring systems to prioritize high-quality prospects

Analytics & Reporting

Monitor and report on all marketing KPIs and campaign performance
Use data insights to continuously optimize strategies
Provide weekly updates and monthly comprehensive reports
Track ROI and cost-per-acquisition across all channels

Required Skills & Experience
Digital Marketing Expertise

3+ years of digital marketing experience, preferably in B2B or real estate
Proven track record of successful SEO campaigns and organic growth
Experience with Google Ads, LinkedIn Ads, and Facebook advertising
Strong understanding of conversion rate optimization and A/B testing

AI Tools Proficiency

Experience with AI content creation tools (Jasper.ai, Copy.ai, ChatGPT)
Familiarity with AI-powered SEO tools (Surfer SEO, SEMrush)
Knowledge of AI features in CRM systems (HubSpot, Salesforce)
Comfort with implementing AI chatbots and automation tools

Technical Skills

Proficiency with Google Analytics, Google Search Console, and SEO tools
Experience with CRM systems (HubSpot, Salesforce, or similar)
Knowledge of WordPress, landing page builders, and basic HTML/CSS
Familiarity with project management tools (Asana, ClickUp, Trello)

Communication & Management

Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Experience managing remote teams and freelancers
Strong project management and organizational abilities
Ability to translate complex marketing concepts into actionable strategies

Preferred Qualifications

Experience in commercial real estate or B2B property marketing

Certification in Google Ads, HubSpot, or similar platforms
Background in managing marketing for multiple target audiences
Experience with virtual tour technology (Matterport) and visual content creation
